alert.note: Alert for Central Walton; North Walton; South Walton; Washington (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 29 at 1:06PM EST by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Gusty showers will impact portions of Walton and southwestern Washington Counties through 1245 PM CST... At 1206 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking gusty showers near Santa Rosa Beach, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Santa Rosa Beach, De Funiak Springs, Eglin Air Force Base, Live Oak, Freeport, Ponce De Leon, Hinsons Crossroads, Portland, Villa Tasso, Blue Mountain Beach, Seaside, Rock Hill, Millers Ferry, Pleasant Ridge, Gulf Pines, Knox Hill, Bunker, Grayton Beach, Sandestin and Four Mile Village. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central Walton; North Walton; South Walton; Washington
